title: Norway to spend less cash from wealth fund in 2020
text:
Norway to spend less cash from wealth fund in 2020

Economy 7 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 02:11AM ET)

Norway to spend less cash from wealth fund in 2020 OSLO (Reuters) - Norway plans to spend less money next year from its $1.1 trillion sovereign wealth fund, the world's largest, the centre-right majority government said on Monday. Under its 2020 draft budget, cash spending from the fund will decline to 243.6 billion Norwegian crowns ($26.79 billion) next year from 246.2 billion crowns in 2019, the Finance Ministry said.

Norway to spend less cash from wealth fund in 2020
description: Norway to spend less cash from wealth fund in 2020
